TextView.android:text: Do parts come in a MBB/ESD Bag?
Is there any punctures in bag?
Take picture of bag seal and bag overall
Is the MSL for the parts correct \nand confirmed with the data sheet or Digi-Key?
Is there any HIC card and desiccant?
Open bag take picture of part resting.
is the bag of parts inside of another container?
does the bag or the container have a factory label
does the manufacturer match the packing slip and po
